description: Numbers n such that the n-th Fibonacci number is composite and the concatenation of its prime factors (written in base 10 in ascending order) is prime.
example: F(24) = 46368 = 2^5 * 3^2 * 7 * 23 is composite and the concatenation 2222233723 is prime, so 24 is in the sequence.
author: _Jeff Burch_
extensions: More terms from _Jens Kruse Andersen_, Jan 05 2003
949 and 958 established as next two terms by _Ryan Propper_, May 29 2006
